description: Pupils will not be required to physically distance from one another if virus levels remain low.
title: Coronavirus: Jersey schools to reopen fully in September
title_page: Coronavirus: Jersey schools to reopen fully in September - BBC News
maintext: "So, it is imperative that we do all we can to return all children back to school full-time while continuing to monitor the situation and prevalence of Covid-19 in the island."
